title: Sins.of.a.Solar.Empire.Entrenchment-
description:
Sins.of.a.Solar.Empire.Entrenchment T H E L E A D i N G F O R C E proudly presents Sins of a Solar Empire: Entrenchment / Stardock RELEASE DATE : 14-03-2009 PROTECTION : Serial & Activation GAME TYPE : Strategy DISKS : 1 CD Release Notes: The interstellar battle between the ancient Vasari and the Trader Emergency Coalition has now been raging for 13 years and the Advent push on the Trader OrderÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s undefended flank has finally been halted after 3 years of devastating losses. With both fronts temporarily stable, the TEC has begun deploying new technologies and testing new strategies that will secure the current territory and prevent further ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œrunning the gauntletÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ strikes against the critical and relatively vulnerable Central Worlds. In the long run, the hope is that this will buy them time to develop and organize an all-out offensive. Build & Customize Massive Starbases Fortify your Empire with new Defenses Ensnare your Enemy with Mine Fields Take on the Challenging new AI Rain Destruction with Assault Cruisers Lose Yourself in Striking new Visuals Notes: This expansion requieres the original Sins of a Solar Empire installed. Install Notes: 1. Unpack release 2. Mount image or burn it 3. Install game 4. Copy the content from SKIDROW dir to your distination dir 5. Play the game Remember to check our cool cracktro first! First micro expansion of a group of three for Sins of a Solar Empire, Entrenchment focuses primarily on the military & scientific aspects in the game. New research and buildings (as mines) change the strategy of each of the three factions in the game. While the original game did not feature any single player campaign, Entrenchment is supposed to occur 15 years after the events in the original game. The three factions, at war, have entrenched themselves.
